com.phunware.cme

Class PwCMEModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.core.CoreModule
      • com.phunware.cme.PwCMEModule

  • public final class PwCMEModule
extends com.phunware.core.CoreModule
    This module can be used to access MaaS Content Management System.

    Get an instance of the PwCMEModule to install into the Core session.

    See Also:
    PwCoreSession.installModules(com.phunware.core.CoreModule...)

      • getContainers

        public static PwContainers getContainers(android.content.Context context)
                                  throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Get all available containers

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        Returns:
        Returns PwContainers object with the available containers.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getSchemas

        public static PwSchemas getSchemas(android.content.Context context)
                            throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Get available schemas up to the first page limit. To get other pages use getSchemas(android.content.Context, int, int).

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        Returns:
        A PwSchemas object.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getSchemas

        public static PwSchemas getSchemas(android.content.Context context,
                   int limit,
                   int offset)
                            throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Get available schemas. Use the limit and offset to define pages.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        limit - Specifies the number of results to return. Max limit value is 100.
        offset - Specifies the number of results to offset.
        Returns:
        A PwSchemas object.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

                 java.lang.String schemaId)
                          throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Return a PwSchema object with the specified schema Id.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        schemaId - The requested schema Id.
        Returns:
        A schema object specified by id.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getStructures

        public static PwStructures getStructures(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String containerId,
                         int depth,
                         boolean withSchema)
                                  throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to get a list of structure items starting at the root.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        depth - The depth to traverse into child structure items.

        • If the depth is set to 0 then no child structure items will be returned
        • if the depth is set to 1 then the immediate child structure will be returned, and so on.

        • To get the full hierarchy of children use -1.

        withSchema - If true then the schema will be returned for structure items that have one.
        Returns:
        Returns PwStructures object containing the list of structures.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getStructure

        public static PwStructure getStructure(android.content.Context context,
                       int structureId,
                       java.lang.String containerId,
                       int depth,
                       boolean withSchema)
                                throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to get a structure for a specified structure id.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        structureId - The ID of the structure.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        depth - The depth to traverse into child structure items.

        • If the depth is set to 0 then no child structure items will be returned
        • if the depth is set to 1 then the immediate child structure will be returned.

        • To get the full hierarchy of children use -1.

        withSchema - If true then the schema will be returned for structure items that have one.
        Returns:
        Returns a PwStructure object
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getContents

        public static PwContents getContents(android.content.Context context,
                     java.lang.String containerId,
                     int structureId,
                     java.lang.String parentId,
                     int limit,
                     int offset)
                              throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Get a list of contents from the structure level.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure to start at. The content will be retrieved starting at the level in the structure hierarchy that the specified structure resides.
        parentId - The parent ID of the content associated to the specified structure.
        limit - Specifies the number of results to return. This is useful for pagination. Max limit value is 100.
        offset - Specifies the number of results to offset. This is useful for pagination.
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON object.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

        parentId - The parent ID of the content associated to the specified structure.
        limit - Specifies the number of results to return. This is useful for pagination. Max limit value is 100.
        offset - Specifies the number of results to offset. This is useful for pagination.
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON object.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • getContent

        public static org.json.JSONObject getContent(android.content.Context context,
                             java.lang.String containerId,
                             java.lang.String contentId,
                             int structureId)
                                      throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        Get a single content.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        contentId - The ID of the content associated to the specified structure.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        Returns:
        Returns a JSON object.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • addContent

        public static void addContent(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.String containerId,
              int structureId,
              java.lang.String parentId,
              org.json.JSONObject data)
                       throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is deprecated and will be removed on the next major release. Use addContent(android.content.Context, String, int, String, org.json.JSONObject) instead.

        This method is used to save new content where parent content exists.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        parentId - The ID of the parent content item. This is used to link up any dynamic children of this structure item that may have already been created, when the associated structure is itself within a dynamic structure item. When this is the case, the only way to know which child content path is associated with this parent content data is to supply the parent to this content item.
        data - An object containing the structure data. The structure of this object is based on the associated schema. Data must be in a JSON structure
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • addContent

        public static void addContent(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.String containerId,
              int structureId,
              org.json.JSONObject data)
                       throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to save new content where no parent content exists.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        containerId - The ID of the container to get the structure for.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        data - An object containing the structure data. The structure of this object is based on the associated schema. Data must be in a JSON structure
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • updateContent

        public static void updateContent(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String contentId,
                 org.json.JSONObject newContent,
                 int structureId)
                          throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to update the existing content item with the specified content id.

        Parameters inside the JSON data must follow these rules: :

          If a parameter IS NOT specified, it will retain its current value.
        • If a parameter IS specified, but with an empty value, then the value will be cleared.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        newContent - The updated content.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • updateContent

        public static void updateContent(android.content.Context context,
                 int structureId,
                 java.lang.String contentId,
                 java.lang.String parentId,
                 org.json.JSONObject newContent)
                          throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to update the existing content item with the specified content id.

        Parameters inside the JSON data must follow these rules: :

          If a parameter IS NOT specified, it will retain its current value.
        • If a parameter IS specified, but with an empty value, then the value will be cleared.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        structureId - The ID of the structure the content is associated to.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        parentId - The specified parent content ID.
        newContent - The updated content. If a parameter IS NOT specified, it will retain its current value. If a parameter IS specified, but with an empty value, then the value will be cleared.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • deleteContent

        public static void deleteContent(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String contentId,
                 boolean traverse)
                          throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to delete a specific content item. If the associated structure for the content is a dynamic object structure residing in a parent array structure then all child content will be deleted as well. However, if the associated structure for the content is a static structure item then only the specified content will be deleted.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        traverse - If set to true then child content will be deleted as well.

        • This parameter is only useful when the content ID is associated to a static structure item.

        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.

      • deleteContentAllChildren

        public static void deleteContentAllChildren(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String contentId)
                                     throws com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException
        This method is used to delete all child elements within an array structure item.

        This method performs a network operation and should be called on a non-UI thread.

        Parameters:
        context - Current context.
        contentId - The specified content Id.
        Throws:
        com.phunware.core.exceptions.PwException - Thrown if an error occurs.
